data.comment: The match has started.
In Dingwall a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 1, Ross County have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ross County's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Motherwell goal kick.
In the minute 4, In Dingwall Motherwell's Chris Long is caught offside.
Motherwell to take a throw-in in Ross County territory.
Free kick in a good position for Motherwell!
In the minute 6, Chris Long for Motherwell gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dingwall.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Nick Walsh awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ross County in the half of Motherwell.
Corner awarded to Ross County.
In the minute 9, Ross County have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
In Dingwall Ross County drive forward through Lee Erwin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Harry Paton (Ross County) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Can Ross County capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Motherwell's half?
Throw-in for Motherwell in their own half.
Ross Stewart gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ross County.
In the minute 11, Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a Ross County throw-in in Motherwell's half.
Motherwell awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Ball safe as Motherwell is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Ross County in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Motherwell.
Throw-in for Ross County at Victoria Park.
Throw-in for Ross County in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Motherwell in the half of Ross County.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
In the minute 17, Motherwell to take a throw-in in Ross County territory.
Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a Motherwell throw-in in Ross County's half.
In the minute 19, Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ross County's half?
Free kick Motherwell.
Can Ross County get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Motherwell's half?
In the minute 23, Ross County have been awarded a penalty...
Motherwell's Declan Gallagher has been booked in Dingwall.
Ross Stewart nets and Ross County now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 25, Nick Walsh awards the away team a throw-in.
Chris Long (Motherwell) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Motherwell's Liam Grimshaw gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Ross County have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Motherwell is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Motherwell at Victoria Park.
In the minute 28, Nick Walsh signals a throw-in for Motherwell, close to Ross County's area.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell in their own half.
Motherwell to take a throw-in in Ross County territory.
In the minute 30, Motherwell push forward at Victoria Park and Chris Long gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ross County defence.
Throw-in for Motherwell close to the penalty box.
Motherwell awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
In the minute 33, Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Ross County in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a Motherwell throw-in in Ross County's half.
Motherwell's Chris Long is whistled for offside at Victoria Park.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Ross County in the half of Motherwell.
Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ross County have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
In the minute 38, Throw-in high up the field for Ross County in Dingwall.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Ross County.
In the minute 41, Ross County awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Ball safe as Ross County is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Ross County in the half of Motherwell.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
Throw-in for Ross County at Victoria Park.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Victoria Park.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ross County's half?
Callum Lang is replacing Mark O'Hara for the away team.
Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell.
In the minute 48, In Dingwall, David Turnbull of Motherwell is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in Motherwell.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell.
In the minute 49, Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ross County in their own half.
Motherwell's Liam Donnelly misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, Nick Walsh awards Ross County a goal kick.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell in their own half.
Callum Lang (Motherwell) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Ross County at Victoria Park.
Throw-in for Ross County in the half of Motherwell.
In Dingwall a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Can Ross County capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Iain Vigurs (Ross County) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Billy McKay for Ross County is whistled offside.
In the minute 56, Ross County have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Motherwell.
Harry Paton is booked for the home team.
In the minute 57, Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell in their own half.
Nick Walsh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Ross County awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Jake Hastie with Sherwin Seedorf. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Robinson.
Throw-in for Ross County in their own half.
Motherwell to take a throw-in in Ross County territory.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Motherwell in the half of Ross County.
Callum Lang for Motherwell drives towards goal at Victoria Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Motherwell are pushing forward but Liam Polworth's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 64, Nick Walsh awards Ross County a goal kick.
Ross County make their first substitution with Michael Gardyne replacing Harry Paton.
Motherwell drive upfield and Callum Lang gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ross County defender.
In the minute 68, Nick Walsh signals a Ross County throw-in in Motherwell's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Motherwell is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Motherwell to take a throw-in in Ross County territory.
In the minute 71, Nick Walsh blows against Motherwell's Callum Lang for offside.
Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Steve Robinson (Motherwell) is making a third substitution, with Jordan White replacing Chris Long.
In the minute 73, An attacking Motherwell player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Liam Donnelly (Motherwell) has missed a penalty!
Ball goes out of play for a Ross County goal kick.
Throw-in for Motherwell at Victoria Park.
Free kick Motherwell.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Lee Erwin with Regan Charles-Cook.
In the minute 76, Ross County needs to be cautious. Motherwell have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Ross County.
In Dingwall a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Motherwell's Nathan McGinley gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ross County defender.
Ross County needs to be cautious. Motherwell have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Motherwell are coming forward and Jordan White gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Ross County at Victoria Park.
In the minute 78, Josh Reid (Ross County) gets a yellow card.
Nick Walsh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ross County at Victoria Park.
Free kick for Ross County in their own half.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
In the minute 83, Tony Watt is on a sub for David Turnbull for Motherwell.
Stuart Kettlewell is making the team's third substitution at Victoria Park with Oli Shaw replacing Billy McKay.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ross County close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Jordan Tillson with Ross Draper.
In Dingwall Ross County attack through Ross Stewart. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dingwall.
Important block from the Ross County defence as Sherwin Seedorf fires in a strike for Motherwell.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
In the minute 87, Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Ross County in their own half.
Motherwell are down to 10 men after Callum Lang has been shown a red card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Dingwall to check on Michael Gardyne, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 88, Ross Countyâ€™s Michael Gardyne is on his feet again at Victoria Park.
Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ross County's half?
Nick Walsh signals a Motherwell throw-in in Ross County's half.
Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Motherwell's Ricki Lamie breaks free at Victoria Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ross County have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Ross County push forward at Victoria Park and Regan Charles-Cook gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Motherwell defence.
Ross County have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Ross County have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Motherwell is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nick Walsh signals a throw-in for Ross County, close to Motherwell's area.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Motherwell in their own half.
Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Ross County awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Regan Charles-Cook (Ross County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
